paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 variant c.1171C>T, p.Q391X, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

patients.demographics: 2 daughters (ages not specified), 1 mother (30 years old)

individual_records.phenotype_details: Diagnosed with LQT2 after suffering from cardiac arrhythmia.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The proband mother had been diagnosed with LQTS type 2 (LQT2; c.1171C > T, p.Q391X in KCNH2) after suffering from cardiac arrhythmia at 30 years of age.
The daughters had a normal QTc interval, but they carried the same disease-causing variant as their mother.
The daughters had a normal QTc interval, but they carried the same disease-causing variant as their mother.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with Long QT Syndrome Type 2.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The study emphasizes the need for genetic testing and counseling for families with LQT2.
key_quotes: Children with family members who have genetically confirmed LQTS have a high risk of suffering from cardiac events later in life.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
